Row.Text: Welcome, my son. We are Pius IX, Supreme Pontiff and Bishop of Rome. We pray that our two great nations can live in harmony; together in the shadow of the Holy Mother Church.
We are Pius IX, Vicar of Christ and Bishop of Rome, and sovereign of the Pontifical state. We grant you the ear of the Holy Mother Church, so speak, my son.
What demon compels your heart to destroy God's kingdom on earth?
Long may you swelter in the sight of God for this wretched action.
Have temperance with your tongue. You annoy Us greatly.
Didn't We already say tell you of Our grave displeasure with this deal?
We are surprised to see you again.
We are displeased with your continual bothering of the Supreme Pontiff.
You are a welcome sight.
We are pleased to see you again. What may We offer you?
Greetings.
What would you like to discuss?
What brings you here today?
Go on.
Let us begin.
We know of your treacherous tongue. We would have you speak quickly, so that you might soon be on your way.
Why are you here?
What business do you have with the Holy Mother Church, wicked one?
We are on the verge of destruction, and you would come to steal the beggar of his bread. What do you want?
We know when We are staring defeat in the face. Have you come to discuss terms?
Is it not time we ended this war?
For the good of our two nations, let us make peace.
The time has come to put down our arms.
Have We come to repent our terrible sins?
We do not wish to do business with those who's tongue is the devil's own puppet.
We are pleased to see Our good friend. What may We do for you?
It shall be not long before the evils of {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} are put to right.
We are praying for the other side to find victory. Perhaps then you would know some humility.
The battles against your heresy will soon be won, and We would crown the victor King over your blasphemous lands.
We pray for your safe passage in these trying times of war. What may we do for you?
We see your military forces near Our borders. Are you here to foolishly threaten Us or are you simply wasting Our time?
The positioning of your military is somewhat worrisome. We advise you to withdraw for the sake of future peace. Now, what would you like to talk about?
The spread of your cities and people is like a plague infecting the land. We look forward to the day that We do not have to see it any more.
While We have this opportunity, We should mention that your expansion has worried several of my officials. We hope that this does not cause any problems in the future. What would you like to discuss?
Your theft of all the territory in your empire showcases your greed. Theft is the most dishonourable of sins.

Your recent trend of buying land near Us is concerning. For the sake of our future relationship We advise that you be cautious in this matter. Now that that's out of the way, what brings you here today?
We've heard many stories of your powerful military. We would advise you to avail yourself to the Holy Mother Church so that this does not become a sin.
It has come to Our attention that your empire is overflowing with wealth. We would ask that you consider donating some to the Church.
We are always pleased to make time for City-States.
We think you have taken too far your quest for peace. As the old addage goes: if you want peace, prepare for war. You seem prepared for neither.
He who's sins are bloody and many dares to approach Us?
We do not feel that this would be in the best interests of the Holy Mother Church.
Friend, We have a serious matter to discuss. Our relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and We need you to denounce them as a show of support. What do you say?
We are displeased with this show of grave dishonour.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced Us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

We've had enough of you. We've told the other leaders of the world that working with you is a mistake.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced Us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Alright, enough is enough. Informing everyone else of your ill deeds is long overdue.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced Us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You have denounced God then.
Ahhh, We've noticed that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. Glad to hear of it. We're already on good terms with them myself.
We recommend that you not get too close with {1_CivName}. If so... we might have problems getting along.
We'll have you know that {1_CivName} and Us have worked together in the past, and We have the utmost respect for them. Just so you're aware.
Glad to hear there are others in the world which share Our displeasure with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
Being on such good terms, We couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. We have done the same. Perhaps this makeshift alliance will lead to great things in the future?
We share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilized empires of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now We have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}? We'll have to teach them a lesson.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
We know your armies march upon Our door. We shall not back down from a fight. We shall not leave the halls of this holy palace.
It's come to Our attention that you have a large number of Units near Church lands. We would ask that you remove them, for their commander is misguided.
It seems your word is worth nothing, as your conquest of {@1_MinorCivName} shows. How despicable. The world will know of your crimes.
Your wanton aggression against {@1_MinorCivName} does not go unnoticed. You will face serious consequences should you continue assault.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there will be consequences for this.
We couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into Church lands. We request that you reconsider this.
Your habit of claiming every bit of land you've spotted has not gone unnoticed. We advise you to discontinue this.
If you should continue to expand your empire in lands We feel belong to the Holy Mother Church it can only ruin the possibility of friendship between Us.
The settling of your people near Our sovereign territory is placing a strain upon relations between our two nations.
Your guarantee of not expanding near Us seems to have been empty words. Know that there will be consequences for this.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near Us is an insult. We had hoped you would be a better neighbor.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. We caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
So it seems you lied when you told Us that your empire would stop purchasing land near Us. We do not take this insult lightly.
We are very disappointed that you did not stop funding land acquisition near Our territory. We had hoped you were a more honorable leader.
It is hard to find worthy friends in this world. We'd like to forge a Pact of Cooperation with your great empire. What do you say?
Great leader, would you care to enter a Pact of Cooperation? My hope is that we can build a long-lasting bond between our two empires.
Let Us plant the seeds of a bright future by forming a Pact of Cooperation. What say you?
This world can be cruel. Only with the assistance of others can we overcome it. Shall we join in a Pact of Cooperation?
We would like to declare with you a friendship, for you have shown such reverence and virtue that you are a model to which all leaders must aspire.
It's time We told the world of your sins.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced Us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

We shall no more tolerant your blashpeming. You are banished from the welcome of Our Holy Mother Church.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced Us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

{1_PlayerName:textkey} has committed the most foulest of heresies, and only through war can their estates be seized and returned to the Holy Mother Church. We ask that you join Us in this holy crusade.
We ask that you join Us in a holy crusade against {1_PlayerName:textkey}, who stands firmly as an enemy to the Papal State and to the Holy Mother Church.
The time has come for you to join Us in Our holy crusade against {1_PlayerName:textkey}.
Your actions are unforgivable. There can never be reconciliation between you and the Holy Mother Church.
Given the circumstances, We have no choice but to assume you are Our enemy. As such, We will do what We must to protect Our interests.
We wanted to make it known to you that We value our friendship, and hope that it might remain strong.
It is clear to all that you are a wise and mighty ruler. We ask that you might also be compassionate towards those like myself who are weak.
Oh great one, Our hope is that you will long serve as a paragon of strength and virtue for lesser leaders such as myself.
Your highly aggressive behavior has not gone unnoticed. Should you keep it up, it will ultimately lead to your downfall.
It's clear you're a fairly uncivilized brute. We have to warn you, your actions are starting to attract quite a bit of attention.
Your warmongering is a popular topic these days. Better watch your back.
You're starting to attract quite a bit of attention. That's not a good thing.

It's come to Our attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within Our sphere of influence, and We'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
We've noticed your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. While that's nice, it would be best that you leave their protection to Us. We'd hate for either of Us to step on any toes.
We couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when We realized it We couldn't help but share.
Ah, it's always nice to see Our favorite city-state again.
We'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Ah, it's you. My apologies. Sometimes We get you mixed up with the barbarians We have to swat from time to time.
We thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your empire hasn't succumb to a barbarian invasion.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
We can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in Our empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to Our attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told Us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little We might give you a hand. Okay, actually We won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war.
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
We've been over this before. The answer is still no.
Very well. We agree to avoid settling in the vicinity of your empire for the time being. Perhaps in the future you will be a more accommodating neighbor.
So be it. We will not settle near your lands. Cooperation is clearly not one of your strong suits.
Unacceptable. We are sovereign and have the right to settle what lands We please. This offense will not be forgotten.
You dare insult God in such a manner? We will not forget this.
How dare you? Do you believe Us to be weak-willed?
That will work. May a strong friendship lead to the flourishing of our empires.
An excellent idea. May our alliance be the envy of the world.
We are happy to accept. May our empires prosper in friendship.
We must decline.
Sorry, but no. Perhaps another time.
We fear that such an arrangement is not in Our best interests, so We must decline.
That sounds like a wise move. Let us take to the battlefield.
That is an intriguing offer. We accept. However, the Holy Mother Church is not yet prepared, so give me 10 turns. We will come to you again when We am ready.
Very well. We do what We must to maintain peace in Our lands.
We will do what it takes to keep the peace.
Fine. But know that you poison your reputation with acts such as these. For what that might be worth to you.
Please. You're in no position to make such demands.
You should be well aware of your own inability to back those threats up.
You're not fooling anyone. We have nothing to fear from you.
Haha! You are not strong enough to make such demands of Us.
You dare insult the Holy Mother Church in such a manner? If you want something so badly then do your best to come and take it.
You'll have to take it from Our dead body.
If you want that you'll have to come and get it.
Unacceptable.
Don't be a fool.
You ask for too much. We will not drive Our nation into poverty to satisfy your greed.
No. We have Our dignity, and refuse to hand over such a great bounty so freely.
Your desire to strip Our lands of so much wealth is intolerable. Do not ask for so much.
You threaten Us again so soon? We refuse your demands, you vile beast.
Asking again so soon? You know that greed is a vice, great leader...
Asking for the fruits of others' labor yet again? Your greed is legendary. We will not give in to you.
Let's hear your offer.
What do you propose?
Let Us return to peace.
We must not let war define who we are. The time has come to make peace.
You have something which the Holy Mother Church demands. We are levying a tax.
We are in dire need of your aide, friend. We know that you will not disappoint God.
We believe open passage between Our Kingdom and your whatever would be most wise.
We would like to negotiate passage through your territory.

We would like to lay plans for establishing a Research Agreement with your great nation. Doing so would require each of Us to spend 150 [ICON_GOLD]. What do you think?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet)
We feel that a Research Agreement is a mutually beneficial arrangement that would help serve to cement our Friendship.
This deal strengthened our nations and our bonds of friendship. Shall we renew this deal and continue our shared prosperity?
This deal has faded in our eyes over the years. To renew this deal, we would need more from your side of the negotiation.
We would like to offer a trade deal for one of your luxury resources.
You have not only attacked Our lands, but the Holy Mother Church, and all those who would rise to defend it.
We shall not fail to overcome your evil, no matter the challenge. Our faith in God is stronger than any army you might march upon Our lands.
We have an army ten times larger than yours, and with faith much stronger. What hope do you have to defeat Us?
Attacking Us was a mistake. We have friends in this world and beyond.
Declaring war was a serious error in judgment on your part. That having been said, We will not hesitate to make you regret it.
We will not hesitate to punish you for making such a foolish move.
We shall not back down from this fight, for We are the keeper of the keys of St. Peter, and they shall not fall from these hands lightly.
We shall revel in this opportunity to please God with your destruction.
We have faith that this task has been placed before Us at the most opportune moment. The Papal armies shall not be defeated.
We are concerned that your judgement has slipped. You will by no feat, large or small, win this upcoming war against God.
Your actions fill Us with sadness... There is surely a special place in Hell for those such as you.
You would attack Us in such a manner? Your hubris knows no limits. We hope that you will one day be judged for this.
Taking advantage of another's weakness is unnecessary in the pursuit of victory. Surely you know there's a better way?
How could you do such a thing? Begone, you vile being.
Taking advantage of someone's trust is despicable. Everyone will know of your betrayal.
It is clear that our two empires will never see eye to eye. This is something that can only be settled on the battlefield.
We had a feeling that the two of Us would some day meet in the field of battle. We will now see which of Us is meant to be victorious.
It is time to fight. Know that only those true to God shall win.
You have betrayed your word. Make no mistake, the world will know of your treachery.
Our proximity has fated Us to be enemies. Let Us see which of Us is fit to survive in this land.
You are too close for comfort. My empire requires more living space.
Your lands will make a fine addition to Our own.
This world is destined to be mine. It is time for Us to show you what that means.
Fate has christened Us the one which shall bring unity to this divided planet.
History shall surely smile on Us once We've destroyed the likes of you and the rest of the heathens which surround Us.
We'll be honest with you - We intend to destroy you along with everyone else.
You are merely a stepping-stone on Our grand ascent to world domination.
Now is the time for Our master plan to commence. It is time for you to die like the rest of these fools.
The advantage is mine. We will now destroy you.
We have waited long enough. We have seen an opening in your defense and We will use it to Our advantage.
We have been waiting a long time for this day. Now would be a good time to put your affairs in order.
It is now Our time. We will defeat you and come one step closer to victory.
Fate is not on your side. Crossing Our path with such weakness is a mistake you will not long regret.
The current situation cannot be ignored. It is now or never.
We cannot ignore this chance to eliminate a potential competitor.
Your weakness presents to Us a great opportunity. You have Our apologies.
Although the task before Us may be impossible, We am compelled to find a way to destroy you and all that you stand for. We will do so or die trying.
It is clear that you are strong. We will, however, find a way to defeat you.
You are a villain without equal. Within every fiber of Our being, We know We must destroy you.
Your might is unmatched, but We will find a way to defeat you.
The time to make a stand is now. The odds are not with Us, but We find a way to destroy you.
Your incredible strength will not deter Us from finding a way to defeat you. May the fates smile on Us.
Although We do not wish it, We fear that now may be Our only opportunity to defeat you. Let Us meet on the battlefield.
Destruction might be the fate which awaits Us, but should We back down only eventual defeat awaits anyways.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
Your weakness is Our opportunity. Placing any trust in Us was a mistake.
Backstab is such an ugly word. Shall we instead say We am just "reinterpreting" our supposed friendship?
We have to admit, We never really liked you much. Pretending to do so was getting old anyways. But enough with the small talk, it's time for you to die.
The odds are clearly not with Us, but We see no alternative to revealing Our deceptive practices. We can now only pray that Our armies succeed.
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
Then war it is.
What is your offer?
What would you suggest?
What is the price of peace?
There can be no peace. Perhaps another day.
This is not the time for negotiation.
We still have business to settle.
We cannot allow peace until God's displeasure has been appeased.
Excellent.
Wonderful.
We are pleased to hear this.
That is good to hear.
You have Our thanks.
You are truly a great leader.
History will long remember your great deeds.
That is a shame.
Perhaps another time then.
That is disappointing.
So be it.
Then you will be responsible for the consequences.
You will regret this.
For freeing those captives, you have Our thanks.
We am appreciative for the actions you have taken on behalf of the Holy Mother Church.
Thank you. May this be remembered as a historic event which brought our two great empires closer together.
How dare you? Know that there will be consequences for this.
If you are trying to provoke a war, you're doing a fine job.
Well, at least you're honest. But that may be your only good trait.
A likely story.
That is what We were afraid of.
We only hope that is indeed the case.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
We remain confident that Our decision was in the best interests of the Holy Mother Church.
It seems that you cannot be reasoned with. What a shame.
We have no more business with the likes of you then.
You disappoint Us.
You know that this can only sow tension between our two nations.
We thought you might like to know that We've launched an invasion of one of your little pet states. The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will make a fine addition to Our own.
Oops, it seems We've attacked your little friend {@1_MinorCivName}. Care to do something about it?

It's come to Our attention that We may have attacked {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. While it was not Our goal to be at odds with your empire, this was deemed a necessary course of action.
We've been informed that Our empire has commenced an attack on {@1_MinorCivName}. We assure you, this was not on purpose, and hope that this does not serve to drive Us apart.
We should consider exchanging embassies, which would allow for more advanced diplomacy between our peoples.
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. What do you think?
Your bullying of {@1_MinorCivName} is intolerable. We demand that you refrain from squeezing tribute out of city-states under Our protection.
We heard about what you did to {@1_MinorCivName}. Did you not realize they are under Our protection? Do not provoke Us further.
We asked {@1_MinorCivName} for a tribute recently and they gave in. You promised to protect them from such things, but we both know you cannot back that up.
Your little friend {@1_MinorCivName} is so easy to push around. They gave in to our tribute demands, and We don't believe you are in a position to do anything about it.
It's come to Our attention that We may have bullied {@1_MinorCivName}, which is under your protection. You do not put their needs above mine, We hope.

We've been informed that Our armies have taken tribute from {@1_MinorCivName}, a city-state under your protection. We assure you, this was quite unintentional, and We hope that this does not serve to drive Us apart.

Warm salutations to you wise leader! We're pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Freedom. The free world will be stronger with one more nation to help Us all fight against oppression!
Greetings comrade! We're pleased to see you also have chosen to follow the path of Order. Perhaps we can find some opportunities to aid each other during our empires' next 5-Year Plans!

Welcome great emperor! We're pleased to see you have also chosen to follow the path of Autocracy. May we work together to ensure that only the very strongest nations survive to achieve true greatness!
How did one of your filthy agents somehow steal one of our basic technological secrets? These may be the last words we speak in peace.
We am willing to overlook your recent theft of one of Our technological secrets with a solemn promise that it won't happen again.
We're glad you agreed to stop this petty thieving.
Your indiscretion is not a surprise.
As you request, Our agents will not conduct operations in your territory.
Our agents help keep our civilization safe from all threats, including you. They operate as we need them to, not as you ask.
Thank you for bringing this {@1_CivAdjective} plot to our attention. With this warning, we will be ready for whatever they may try. Your generous aid will be remembered.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} is currently marching an army your way in a sneak attack. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts to sneak attack your city of {2_CityName}. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} embarked an army with naval escorts in a sneak attack against your civilization. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with Us.
We killed your spy as it was trying to steal from Us. From Our experience, it is far less dangerous to read a book and try to learn something yourself.
We regret any confusion caused by our late agent's recent activity. Please let any hostile feelings rest with the deceased operative.
Hello there. Are you here about that little spying incident?
One of Our cities was recently burglarized and technological secrets were stolen. May We be assured that you had nothing to do with this?
We're convinced you've been spying on Our great civilization. You should stop before somebody gets hurt.
We have taken notice of the foul blasphemies you are undertaking inside our empire. We must ask you to cease this activity immediately!
We understand that some actions may not be forgiven.
It makes Us glad that you will overlook this awkward circumstance.
We'm glad you agreed to end this proselytizing.
Your religious fervor is unsettling.
As you wish, Our missionaries will no longer share the one true faith with the people in your cities.
In spite of your protests, your citizens will continue to be enlightened by the one true faith, even though you damn your own people to live in ignorance.
We are eagerly anticipating your unconditional surrender.
Your complete capitulation sounds reasonable.
We can make a deal now to forestall your utter annihilation.
We were very pleased to hear your recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. It seems that our goals are aligned.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} suits our interests quite nicely. You have our sincere gratitude.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is a blatant attack on our interests. We hope this does not escalate to future conflict.
We found your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} very troubling. Surely there is a better way to resolve our differences than petty politics.
Thanks to the help of your delegates, our recent proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was successful. We look forward to your continued support, and will try to return the favor.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} succeeded, with the support of your delegation. Together we can accomplish many great things.
Your delegation played a part in the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. We do not take such transgressions lightly.
Our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was defeated at the hands of your delegates. Do not expect our delegation to support your interests in the future.
We thank you for entrusting the World Congress to our capable leadership. We expect great things to come in the {1_LeagueName}.
We'll see about that.
Yes, that's right.
We remain confident that Our decision was the best for Our people and Our nation.
Very well. We'll be monitoring the situation.
We are not willing to offer you enough to make this a fair trade.
Any deal we suggest would result in an unfair exchange for you.
We've noticed that you've been looking for cultural artifacts within our borders. This needs to stop.
Sorry, our plans are too important to be stopped over a trinket.
As you wish, we will stop looking for artifacts within your borders.
Do We have to escalate this?
Thank you for heeding our request. An artifact discovered on our land belongs to our people, not yours.
We'll dig wherever We want.
We meant no offense when attempting to steal your cultural heritage.
The people of Our nation have been corrupted by your bourgeois messages of liberty and equality. They seem to believe they have the right to demonstrate in the streets!
Your ideological plotting has Us scared of a revolution for Order in our land. Will these workers' strikes never end?
Your message of strength through supreme power has resonated with our people. Must we imitate your feared totalitarian state?
Your citizens clamor for human liberties. Tear down this wall of oppression and join the cause of Freedom and progress!
The oppressed workers of your land are unhappy. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you!
Your restless people are in need of strong leadership. Join Us in writing history instead of sitting there with your hands folded.
With celebration, we greet you in joining Us in our quest for Freedom. Ask not what we can do individually, ask instead what we can do together.
Give Us the child for eight years and it will be a socialist forever. Your working class have heard this truth; now we welcome them to our revolutionary struggle for Order.

You will not regret your move to Autocracy. All within the state; nothing outside the state; nothing against the state. Only the strong leaders of strong states can bring the world into a glorious new era together.
We are glad to see that sales of our souvenirs to tourists from your lands have reached record levels. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
